frameDefinitions: This frame describes an Agent's gathering of Individuals (people or entities) into a group, the  Aggregate, defined by relative proximity.
A Cognizer decides upon the Chosen (either an item or a course of action) out of a set of  Possibilities .
A Gatherer removes Crop ripe and ready to an accepted degree.
A Recipient (who may or may not be agentive) ends up in possession of a Mass_theme (which may be conceptualized as a single mass entity, or may be a group of individual entities).
An Inspector attains a degree of certainty in the Unconfirmed_content, generally by inspecting some evidence.
In this frame a group of Individuals meet to form a Configuration.
frameExamples: The police <t>gathered</t> the suspects into a line-up.
The council <t>picked</t> you out of all the pilots available to head this mission.
They <t>harvest</t> their pumpkins in the Autumn. INI
Bogs <t>accumulate</t> carbon for thousands of years.
The crowd <t>came together</t> in the courtyard.
listRoleDefinitions: This role identifies the aggregate that results from the gathering.  It may be expressed either as an adjunct result phrase or as a direct object of a target verb.
Agent is the person who gathers Individuals.
This role identifies the entities that come together to form an Aggregate.

This role identifies the time when the gathering event occurs, if specified.
The crowd assembled <fex name='Time'>at dawn</fex>.

This role identifies the place where the gathering event occurs.
He <t>assembled</t> the children <fex name='Place'>in the hall</fex>.
The <fen>Cognizer</fen> chooses the <fen>Chosen</fen> out of the <fen>Possibilities</fen>.
<fen>Chosen</fen> identifies the entity or course of action which is selected from among the <fen>Possibilities</fen>.

A <fen>Cognizer</fen> makes a choice from among a set of <fen>Possibilities</fen>. <fen>Possibilities</fen> are commonly expressed via an oblique phrase which indicates the alternative or alternatives, or by a subordinate clause (choosing to do it or choosing not to do it), typically headed by 'whether or 'if'.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> chooses the <fen>Chosen</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the choosing occurs.
The <fen>Gatherer</fen> is the agent gathering the <fen>Crop</fen>.
<fen>Crop</fen> is item being collected together by the <fen>Gatherer</fen>.
The <fex name='Source'>Source</fex> is the ground where the <fex name='Crop'>Crop</fex> is gathered from.
When the <fen>Crop</fen> gathering action occurs.
The greater geographic location where the <fen>Gatherer</fen> gathers his <fen>Crop</fen>.
The <fen>Recipient</fen> indicates the entity that ends up in possession of the <fen>Mass_theme</fen>.
The collection of objects that ends up in the <fen>Recipient</fen>'s possession.
When the event occurs.
The <fen>Place</fen> denotes where the <fen>Mass_theme</fen> is acquired.
The individual or individuals that ascertain that the <fen>Unconfirmed_content</fen> is true.
An open proposition that the <fen>Inspector</fen> decides by examining evidence.  It is usually a propostion put forward which some parties would disbelieve or contest.
The <fen>Medium</fen> is the piece of text or work in which the <fen>Inspector</fen> verifies the <fen>Unconfirmed_content</fen>:
This role describes the <fen>Time</fen> at which the verification event takes place.
This role describes where the verificiation event takes place.
The <fen>Individuals</fen> are self-movers who come together.
The <fen>Configuration</fen> describes the resulting formation of the individuals.
<fen>Party_1</fen> is the grammatically more prominent participant in the congregating event.
A grammatically less prominent participant in the congregating event.
The <fen>Time</fen> is when the congregating occurs.
The <fen>Place</fen> is where the congregating occurs.
listRoleExamples: The police gathered the suspects <fex>into a line-up</fex>.
<fex>The police</fex> gathered the suspects into a lineup.
The police gathered <fex>the suspects</fex> into a line-up.
<fex>We</fex>have to pick a colour for the living room.
I decided <fex>to give it another try</fex>.
They chose their new guitarist <fex>out of more than 300 auditioners</fex>.
I was n't chosen <fex>in the last round</fex>.
The winner was selected <fex>in the secret meeting room</fex>.
<fex>Tubers</fex> harvested immediately after spraying developed gangrene.
They picked the apples <fex>from the tallest trees</fex>.
<fex>His</fex> later verification of the facts is certainly beyond reproach.
It is extremely difficult to confirm <fex>the absence of something</fex>.
<fex>Chapter four</fex> confirms the reader 's suspicions completely.
<fex>The crowd</fex> gathered on the streets of Paris.
<fex>Our group</fex> met with theirs in the plaza.
Our group met <fex>with theirs</fex> in the plaza.

passageCandidateSpans.text: the Intelligence and Security Committee of Parliament

sourceCandidateSpans.text: The Interception of Communications Commissioner's Office
the International Institute for Strategic Studies
